Trade/Device Name(s): ACE Direct Total Iron-Binding Capacity (TIBC) Reagent
Regulatory Class: Class I (exempt, meets limitations of exemption per 21 CFR 862.9 (c)(9))
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACE LDH-L, ACE Direct Total Iron-Binding Capacity (TIBC), and ACE Total Iron reagents for quantitative determinations in serum using ACE Alera Clinical Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of total iron-binding capacity, iron (non-heme), and lactate dehydrogenase activity in serum to aid in diagnosis and treatment of anemia, liver and cardiac diseases, and related conditions; for use in clinical and physician office laboratories; for in vitro diagnostic use only.
